message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good in later rounds.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
Time is running out!  Let's split the difference from my last offer and end this.
I'm willing to compromise, but don't try to lowball me!
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Let's be smart and take the money before it's worth even less.
